channel.title: Sketch - Rectangles on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch - Rectangles on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Corner Rectangle
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create Corner Rectangle through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

For this, I take the example from previous Sketch - Create Lines post.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Center Rectangle
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create Center Rectangle through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Solidworks Macros - Create Corner Rectangle From VBA Macro post.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create 3-Point Corner Rectangle
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create 3-Point Corner Rectangle through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create 3-Point Center Rectangle
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create 3-Point Center Rectangle in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Solidworks Macros - Create 3-Point Corner Rectangle post.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create A Parallelogram
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create a Parallelogram through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Solidworks Macros - Create 3-Point Corner Rectangle post.
